data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Why Hardware

    Although MIX never comes out as a real machine, it is still a
    imaginary machine. That is why put this module in the Hardware
    namespace

    Why Hardware::Simulator

    This module is a simulator which has registers and memory just as
    MIX does.

    why Hardware::Simulator::MIX

    It is best.
